text: Hans-Dieter "Hansi" Flick (born 24 February 1965) is a German professional football coach and former player who is the head coach of the Germany national football team. On 17 April 2021, Flick has stated that he wanted to leave Bayern Munich at the end of the season. This was caused by a fallout between Flick and Hasan Salihamidžić. ==Managerial statistics== Team From To Record Victoria Bammental 1 July 1996 30 June 2000 1899 Hoffenheim 1 July 2000 19 November 2005 Bayern Munich 3 November 2019 30 June 2021 Germany 1 August 2021 present Total ==Honours== ===Player=== Bayern Munich *Bundesliga: 1985–86, 1986–87, 1988–89, 1989–90 *DFB-Pokal: 1985–86 *DFB-Supercup: 1987 *European Cup runner-up: 1986–87 1\.
